BOARDING_ITEMS.name: Additional Dog
BOARDING_ITEMS.description: Board an additional dog in a suite you have booked already.

BOARDING_ITEMS.name: Outside of Hours Pickup
BOARDING_ITEMS.description: Pickups on Sunday or after operating hours.

BOARDING_ITEMS.name: Medication Administration
BOARDING_ITEMS.description: Puppy Love Suites will administer your dogs medication during their stay.
details: Must be able to provide dosage and frequency for entire stay

BOARDING_ITEMS.name: Puppy Love Food
BOARDING_ITEMS.description: Puppy Love Suites will provide food for you dog during their stay.
details: Brands are selected by Puppy Love Suites
It is encouraged to provide your dogs regular food
